sen.j: 禎子内親王（ていし（よしこ/さだこ）ないしんのう、長和2年7月6日（1013年8月15日） - 寛治8年1月16日（1094年2月3日））は、第67代三条天皇の第三皇女。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Teishi (Yoshiko/Sadako) (August 15, 1013 - February 3, 1094) was the sixty seventh Emperor Sanjo's third Princess.

sen.j: 禎子内親王の誕生は祖父道長と父三条天皇の間がしっくりいかない最中のことであり、それだけに皇子誕生で関係改善を期していた道長は女御子であったことに不機嫌であった。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Teishi (Yoshiko/Sadako) was born while the relationship of her grandfather, Michinaga and Emperor Sanjo was not going well, therefore Michinaga was not happy having baby girl since he was expecting to have baby boy for future Prince to be to improve the relationship with the Emperor.

sen.j: しかし三条天皇はこの末の皇女に非常に愛情を注ぎ、道長も後にはその外孫にふさわしく遇して、着裳の際には伯母の太皇太后藤原彰子が腰結いの役をつとめている。
sen.e: However Emperor Sanjo loved this youngest Princess very much, Michinaga also treated this grandchild born of his daughter very well, the Princess's aunt, Grand Empress Dowager, FUJIWARA no Shoshi did Koshiyui (a person who tie the ribbon of the Hakama at the ceremony) at the Mogi ceremony for the Princess.

sen.e: After her aunt, Crown Prince's Empress, FUJIWARA no Kishi died, Imperial Princess Teishi (Yoshiko/Sadako) made an Imperial Consort's bridal entry of Crown Prince into the court as it was Michinaga's intention to do so, although there was another candidate who was Princess Teishi's uncle, FUJIWARA no Norimichi's daughter, it is apparent that the Princess Teishi was treated very well as one of Michinaga's family member.
